outputs.output_descr:
Result 1. Improved basic living conditions in the households that have been affected by partial or total destruction of roofs.
Result 2. Impreoved access to safe water and hygienic conditions to families who lost their home partially.

project_descr: Reestablishing basic living conditions of families affected by the Hurricane Sandy in the selected municipalities of Santiago de Cuba province.
project_title: Reestablishing basic living conditions of families
